# About

Welcome to the introductory R course!  This is the course website where all course content will be made accessible, including the slides, code and other resources. We meet on Thursdays, 2 - 4 pm IST. This website collates all the presentations, course content and other resources. We will populate the site as we go. Please contact us if you have trouble accessing the content.
